name: 陌生人唱歌Wanderers Singing
lyric:
西部大湖那边有个传说
你无可事事也不怕惹事
我从不祈祷只会安心做梦
在这个充满陌生人的世界上
我将会带上你和我一起
陌生人在唱歌是为了你
我正唱这首歌因为时候到了
守着他在我们离去之前
所以再见郑重请收下这把钥匙

每个夜晚都是老样子
虽然我孤身一人没时间留给一些烂人
告诉他们新的趋势安心做梦吧
在你心里你仍然有个地方要去
陆续做个面无表情的主儿吧
陌生人在唱歌是为了你
我正唱这首歌因为时候到了
有时候夜晚只能给我们一次机会
所以再见珍重旅途在召唤我

守着他在我们离去之前
所以再见郑重请收下这把钥匙
有时候夜晚只能给我们一次机会
所以再见珍重旅途在召唤我



Wanderers Singing
Composer/Lyrics: Zuoxiao Zuzhou

There is a legend from the great west lake,
You have nothing to do, and are not afraid to cause trouble,
I never pray, I can only dream to my quiet consciousness,
In this world full of wanderers,
I will bring you together with me,
Wanderers are singing songs for you,
I’m singing this song because the moment has come,
Watch over him, before we depart,
And so, goodbye, take care, please accept this key.

Every night is the same as before,
Although I am alone by myself, with no time left for rubbish people,
Tell them the new trends, just dream to quiet consciousness,
In your heart, you still have a place to go,
Follow the trend, to be a lord without expression,
Wanderers are singing songs for you,
I’m singing this song because the moment has come
Sometimes the night can only give us one chance,
So goodbye, take care, the journey beckons me.

Watch over him, before we depart,
And so, goodbye, take care, please accept this key.
Sometimes the night can only give us one chance,
So goodbye, take care, the journey beckons me.
lyric_extra: 文本歌词最后由 虾小编 编辑于2019-09-11 21:57

comments.brief:
作为左小不那么难听的几首之一突然觉得少了点什么

来自android客户端

author.name: 虾米用户
author.motto: 再见虾米，感谢你的陪伴！

comments.brief:
发横财以后，都是靡靡之音

来自iPhone客户端
